ygData.msgSnippet: Nightlight::: Where you go? said worried Nightlight Wait!!! It was late Grounded was left the base and the shields was turned on ... with a ... energy ...

Nightlight:::

"Where you go?" said worried Nightlight "Wait!!!"

It was late Grounded was left the base and the shields was turned on

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jordan Guthrie <gunthers8@n...> wrote:
> ::Grounded::
> Grounded listened to all that was happening.  He heard Arrow and 
with a 
> touch of some buttons on his wrist comp the shields opened.
> "Arrow, you must listen before taking act for I can tell from the 
energy 
> in your spark what you may intend to do.  Burning Hammer is 
in...what 
> you call a personality conflict, of what he is, and what he wants 
to be. 
>   He proves to be no harm right now, so please leave him to be. But 
i 
> feel the vibrations of something moving through the ground, which 
is my 
> territory. Nightlight please help Burning Hammer and the rest.  
Also i 
> have heard something from that Deemos that is quite upsetting. He 
wishes 
> to kill Trinity. Keep her out of trouble. I will leave now." 
Grounded 
> replied and using only vibrations to tell where things were ran and 
dove 
> outside digging into the ground in a perfevt path to intercept 
Stranato. 
> Grounded had finally remembered all of his past, but he would worry 
> about that later.
> 
> airly2000@y... wrote:
> 
> > Nightlight::
> > 
> > "Arrow..." said with a low voice Nightlight and she shouted "All 
it's
> > ok, Arrow, don't worry... Zeni it's ok. He isn't hurt...
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> >  > Burning Hammer looked at Nighlight now. WIth sad eyes and a
> > confused look.
> >  > Zeni came out from behind Burning Hammer and stepped in front 
of
> > him. Arrow
> >  > could be heard from outside.
> >  >
> >  > Arrow: Open the shields! Come on, open them! Open them!!!
> >  >
> >  > Burning Hammer eyes darted to the door.
> >  >
> >  > Burning hammer: Shouldn't you open the shields?
> >  >
> >  > His eyes quickly returned to Zeni. Zeni held out his hand to 
the
> > serial
> >  > killer turned bounty hunter. Burning Hammer took his hand.
> >  >
> >  > Burning Hammer: I killed my best friend, kid, I'm not so 
great, not
> > great
> >  > like I thought I was. I killed him because there was a bounty 
on
> > him. if
> >  > that tells how great I am.
> >  >
> >  > Zeni: You can still be great.
> >  >
> >  > Arrow: Open the damn door!
> >  >
> >  > Arrow never let up, never stopped yelling until he got what he
> > wanted...
